Container.Name: Compressarr
Container.Description: A tool that integrates with Radarr and Sonarr and uses FFmpeg to recompress items from your library
Container.Overview: Compressarr is an application to take a filtered set of media from Radarr or (eventaully) Sonarr and process it with customisable FFmpeg presets. This is the Apline version supporting limited Intel hardware support. For Nvidia Cuda encoding use the Nvidia version which is 1.4GB using the Ubuntu Core.

Config.Name: Config directory
Config.Description: This is where Compressarr will store it's configuration.

Config.Name: Media directory
Config.Description: This needs to be the same as the root for Radarr/Sonarr. Create more as required

Config.Name: Output directory
Config.Description: This is an output directory, Radarr/Sonarr needs to see this for importing to work
